details:
mac80211: fix skb length check in ieee80211_scan_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.13 by commit d1b949c70206178b12027f66edc088d40375b5cb, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit cd418ba63f0c2f6157f35a41c9accc6ecb52590a. For more details please see the references link.
